title: Is using VPN allow?
body: I found a way to solve my server connection but it involve VPN, so my question is using VPN allow? does it count at using 3rd party program to interfere with the game?

replies.body: VPN applications are a third party that we don't support, but we don't ban for it.  It can often help players who are having routing issues with the ISPs or other factors, but we can't offer support specifically with the program used if something goes wonky.  Keep in mind as well that using a VPN could also increase your ping based on how you're being routed.  You can also check our[ third party guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) for more info as well!
